featured.text: They are sent to a wide variety of service-based businesses, including stores, restaurants, and banks—potentially anywhere customers are served.

Additionally, by having branches that do not touch those of their neighbors, trees may be able to limit the spread of leaf-eating insects, and potentially also the transmission of diseases from tree to tree.
Bottled water is mostly sold in plastic bottles and that’s why it is potentially health 26 .

definition.en_def: In a way that has the capacity to develop into something in the future.
definition.example: The new technology could potentially change the way we communicate.
